title: Boutique Mexico Five-Star Beachside Suites Overlooking Tangolunda Bay within Huatulco Region
description: Nestled in the resort region of Huatulco, Mexico is the five-star Quinta Real Huatulco, a boutique beachfront oasis with just 27 exclusive suites. Perched on a hill overlooking the shimmering waters of Tangolunda Bay, the hotel boasts an elegant fusion of Mexican and Moroccan architecture and is beautifully decorated with hand-painting furnishings and topped off with luxurious facilities. Four exceptional onsite restaurants and bars await to toast to your stay: Las Cúpulas serves up stunning ocean views from both the restaurant and the adjacent bar, La Cuija Beach Club offers a variety of light dishes served poolside and Sky Lounge, built around a magnificent fig tree at the highest point of the hotel, is all about lavish cocktails and tranquillity. When you need a break from the heat, take a dip in the expansive swimming pool or take a few short steps to float in the dazzling Pacific Ocean. With nine bays, 36 beaches and a nature reserve nearby, a Huatulco escapes promises both relaxation and adventure.
offer_address: Paseo Benito Juárez Lote 2, Bahía de Tangolunda, 70989 Bahías de Huatulco, Oaxaca, Mexico
